auth.rightDescription: Manage end-to-end flow, from pricing cabinets to orders and returns with our premium sales automation software tailored to kitchen industry. A flexible and component-based B2B solution that can integrate with your existing inventory, accounting, and other systems.

deleteStyle.deleteInfo: Delete Action: All {{count}} items with style "{{style}}" will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
deleteStyle.mergeSuccess: Successfully processed {{total}} items: {{merged}} merged to "{{style}}", {{duplicates}} duplicates removed

settings.costMultiplierHelp: Cost multiplier controls the price you pay to manufacturer. You can see your cost in Proposal when you turn off Customer multiplier.
settings.customerMultiplierHelp: Customer price multiplier controls the price at which you sell to your customers. This is what determines your profit.
